name: Platypus game
description:

so introducing ...

Platypus Game

You want to build up your collections, you want to annoy people, and hurt some people. So you go to the big city. a random person says that your name is Lord Farquaad, and that is why you hate humans... your just a bratty platypus that everyone loves
